org.opengis.cite.owc10.atom

Class AtomWmsTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.owc10.CommonFixture
      • org.opengis.cite.owc10.atom.AtomWmsTests

  • public class AtomWmsTests
extends CommonFixture
    Defines test methods that apply to an Atom (RFC 4287) representation of a context document that includes one or more WMS offerings.

    Sources

    • OGC 12-084r2: OGC OWS Context Atom Encoding Standard, Version 1.0
    • The Atom Syndication Format (RFC 4287)

    • Constructor Detail

      • AtomWmsTests

        public AtomWmsTests()

    • Method Detail

      • hasWmsOfferings

        public void hasWmsOfferings()
        Run the tests to assess "Atom WMS" conformance only if the context document contains WMS service offerings. Otherwise they will be skipped.

      • checkSchematronRulesForWmsOfferings

        public void checkSchematronRulesForWmsOfferings()
        [Test] Checks the content of WMS service offerings in the context document. In particular, each offering must satisfy all of the following constraints:
        • has an owc:operation element with @code = 'GetCapabilities'
        • has an owc:operation element with @code = 'GetMap'
        • the referenced WMS is available
        See Also:
        Atom WMS Offering
